column4: ﻿histo: maybe flush your resolver ? you have iptables setup ?
﻿histo:  could be your isp is working on that DNS flaw, just an idea
﻿histo: yes setup your router to use OpenDNS
it's the NA root dns server
whomever owns the ip doesn't necessarily mean who owns the server :P
that's actually a multihomed ip address, so level3 is just one of the paths
it lets him use dns for now
heh, not what I was saying, but sure
4.2.2.1 the rootdns server is multihomed on level3 and other tier2 internet connections
